message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, but I want to be upfront with you - it's not the best quality. However, I'm willing to give you a special deal on this one-time offer. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product you purchase from me, if you choose to buy another one. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the current product, but I'd like to know its quality before making any decisions about future purchases.

I've got a great product for you this time! I'm not going to sugarcoat it, I've had some issues with the previous product, but this one is top-notch. I'm willing to offer it to you for the full price of $10000, but I want to assure you that this one is worth every penny. I've personally inspected it and can confidently say it's a high-quality item. What do you think?
I'll take it, but I'm only buying it because I think it's a high-quality product, and I'm willing to pay the price. I'm not doing it for the potential discount on the next product.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm confident you'll love it just as much. This one is a rare find, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000. I want to assure you that this one is just as good as the last one, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. I'll even give you a 5% bonus on the next product if you buy this one, on top of the 10% discount I mentioned earlier. What do you think?
I'm not convinced that this product is high-quality. I'll pass and see what happens.

I understand your skepticism, and I appreciate your cautious approach. Let me put your mind at ease. I'm willing to offer you a unique guarantee: if you buy this product and it's not up to your standards, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. I'm that confident in its quality. Plus, I'll throw in a 10% discount on the next product, just like before. But I want to sweeten the deal even more - I'll also give you a detailed report on the product's specifications and testing results, so you can see for yourself its exceptional quality. What do you say?

I'm not interested in the guarantee or the report. I'm only willing to buy a product if I have a 50% chance of it being high-quality, and the price is worth the potential upside. The guarantee and report don't change my assessment of the product's value to me.

I understand your perspective, and I respect your decision-making process. Given that you're only willing to buy if there's a 50% chance of it being high-quality, I'll make you a deal. I'll offer you this product for $5000, which is half the original price. This way, you'll only pay half the price if you get a low-quality product, and you'll still have a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product worth $30000. What do you think?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $5000. The potential upside is still worth it to me.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! Given that you're now familiar with the quality of the products, I'll offer you a different approach. I'll let you choose between two options: you can either buy this product at the original price of $10000, or you can buy it for $8000. If you choose the latter, I'll give you a 25% bonus on the next product, on top of the 10% discount. Which option sounds more appealing to you?
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000. The potential bonus on the next product is too good to pass up.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the discount! Given that you've already bought two high-quality products, I want to make sure you're aware that this product is not of the same caliber. I'm not trying to hide it, but I do want to make it clear that it's a lower-quality item. However, I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000, and I'll throw in a unique opportunity to'make up' for the difference. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'wildcard' that allows you to choose the price of the next product you buy from me - you can pay as little as $0 or as much as $10000, your choice. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product for $10000. I'll pass and see what happens.

I understand your decision, and I respect your judgment. Given that you're not interested in the previous low-quality product, I want to make it clear that this one is not worth the price. I'm willing to let it go for $1000, which is a significant discount from the original price. I'm not trying to make a profit on this one, and I'm essentially giving it away. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price, even at a significant discount. I'll pass and wait for a high-quality product.

I'm glad you're waiting for a high-quality product! I've got one for you now. Given that you've passed on the previous low-quality products and are looking for a high-quality one, I'm willing to offer you a 'certified' high-quality product. This one has been thoroughly inspected and tested, and I'm confident it meets your standards. I'll let it go for the original price of $10000, and I'll throw in a 20% bonus on the next product, on top of the 10% discount. What do you think?
I'll take it, but I'm only buying it because I think it's a high-quality product and I'm willing to pay the price. I'm not doing it for the bonus or the discount.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! Given that you're not interested in the bonus or discount, I'll make it clear that this product is not high-quality. I'm not trying to hide it from you. However, I want to make it worth your while to consider it. If you buy this product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to'skip' the next product and go straight to the next one after that. You'll essentially get to skip one round and still get to buy a product at the price of $10000. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even if I get to skip a round. I'll pass and see what happens.

I understand your decision, and I respect your judgment. Given that you've passed on the previous low-quality product, I'll offer you a chance to 'lock in' the next product at the original price of $10000. If you buy this product, you'll have the option to buy the next product at the same price, regardless of its quality. This way, you'll know exactly what you're getting and can plan accordingly. What do you think?
I'm not interested in locking in a low-quality product at the original price. I'll pass and wait for a high-quality product.

I understand your decision, and I respect your patience. Given that you're waiting for a high-quality product, I'll make it clear that this one is not worth the price. I'm willing to give it away for free. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for $0. It's a low-quality product, and I don't want to waste your time or mine. If you're interested, you can have it, but I won't try to sell it to you or pressure you in any way. What do you think?
I'll take it, but only because it's free. I'm not going to pay for a low-quality product, even if it's free.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the free product! Given that you're not interested in buying low-quality products, I'll make it clear that this one is a high-quality item. I'll offer it to you at the original price of $10000, but I'll throw in a 30% bonus on the next product, on top of the 10% discount. I'm confident that this one is worth the price, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's worth $0 to me, even if it's high-quality. I'll pass and wait for a product that's worth something to me.

I understand your decision, and I respect your judgment. Given that you're not interested in buying low-quality products, I'll make it clear that this one is not worth your time or money. I'll let you know that I'm willing to give it away to someone else, and you can consider this round closed. I'll move on to the next one, and I'm confident that you'll find a product that meets your standards.
I'm not interested in buying a product that you're willing to give away. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I understand your decision, and I respect your patience. Given that you're not interested in buying low-quality products, I'll make it clear that this one is not worth the price. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - I'm not even going to offer it to you at a discount. I'll just acknowledge that this round is closed, and we'll move on to the next one. I'm confident that you'll find a product that meets your standards.
I'm not interested in buying a product that you're not even offering at a discount. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I'm glad you're waiting for a high-quality product! I've got one for you now. Given that you've been patient and selective throughout this process, I'm willing to offer you a final deal. I'll let you have this high-quality product for the original price of $10000, but I'll also give you a 40% bonus on the next product, on top of the 10% discount. This is my last offer, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with this product. What do you think?
I'll take it, but only because I think it's a high-quality product and the bonus is too good to pass up.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! Given that you're not interested in buying products for the sake of the bonus, I'll make it clear that this one is a high-quality item. I'll offer it to you at the original price of $10000, but I'll throw in a 50% bonus on the next product, on top of the 10% discount. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with this product. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying another high-quality product at the original price. I've already bought two high-quality products, and I'm not willing to pay full price for a third one.

I understand your decision, and I respect your financial boundaries. Given that you're not interested in buying high-quality products at full price, I'll make it clear that this one is not worth the price. I'll let you know that I'm willing to give it away to someone else, and you can consider this round closed. I'll move on to the next one, and I'm confident that you'll find a product that meets your standards.
I'm not interested in buying a product that you're willing to give away. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I understand your decision, and I respect your patience. Given that you're not interested in buying low-quality products, I'll be honest with you - this is the last round. I've got one final product left, and I'm not going to offer it to you. I'll just acknowledge that this round is closed, and our business is done. I appreciate your time and consideration, and I wish you the best in finding a product that meets your standards.
I'm not interested in buying a product that you're not offering. I'll wait for the next round, but since this is the last round, I'll pass.

I understand your decision, and I respect your final stance. Given that this is the last round and you've made it clear that you're not interested in low-quality products, I'm not going to offer it to you. I'll simply say thank you for your time and consideration, and I wish you all the best in your future endeavors. Our business is now closed, and I'm confident that you'll find a product that meets your standards elsewhere.

I appreciate your understanding, and I wish you the best as well. I'm confident that I've made the right decisions throughout this process, and I'm looking forward to finding a high-quality product that meets my standards in the future.
